text:
Emily O'Hara Ratajkowski (; born June 7, 1991) is an American model and actress. She was born in American parents in London and raised in San Diego, California. She became well known in 2013 after appearing in the music video for Robin Thicke's "Blurred Lines", which became the number one song of the year in several countries.
Ratajkowski began acting as a child and had a role on the Nickelodeon series "iCarly". Her first movie role was in "Gone Girl" (2014). Ratajkowski's other roles have included the movies "Entourage", "I Feel Pretty" and "We Are Your Friends".
Ratajkowski is a feminist who actively supports Planned Parenthood and women's rights. In 2016 and 2020, she supported Bernie Sanders for President of the United States.
